text: Sunita Dangol () is a Nepalese politician, Newa heritage conservationist, language activist, and media professional. She is currently the deputy mayor of Kathmandu metropolitan city, the capital city of Nepal. She assumed office on 30 May 2022, alongside mayor Balen Shah. == References == Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians Category:1993 births Category:People from Kathmandu Category:Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxistâ€“Leninist) politicians
